TextView.android:text: Events management with onsite access control with QR-codes and Bar-codes and back end access of the database
Event e-ticketing management and solutions including e-cards like e-posters for all kinds of events
Social media management solutions and digital marketing with use of info graphic designing for commercial purposes
Website analytics involving website designing, marketing and management
Corporate grade Audio Visual services including wireless microphones and lavalieres and a mixer for audio control of conferences and other large audience events
Video Production for product and personality marketing and management
Print media designing of business cards, banners, posters for commercial purposes
Motion graphic designing which includes animations, a voice over artist for narrations and a script writer to create an attractive script
Online Public Relation Services like e-branding, advertising and online press releases for product and personality arrangements
Setup of YouTube channels and live video streaming services for conferences, product and personality reasons.
Search Engine Optimization that helps clients earn that online competitive advantage and increases our clients' online visibility on all social media platforms
E-mail marketing and management with e-mail follow ups, RSVP follow-ups and attendance confirmation of events.
Pay Per Click Advertising which helps in boosting our clients' website performances by appearing on all search engines and major social media platforms
Reputation Management Services for products and personalities through brand preservation, strategic advertising and monitoring of clients' online reputations
Quality photography of about 6hours of an event with studio setting of back droops and lighting
Quality videography of about 6 hours with studio setting of backdrops and lighting, 360 camera, and editing of the footage
Online Content generation, marketing and management of our clients media accounts which strengthens our clients business stories and attracts new prospects
Mobile Optimization like mobile website designing and mobile social media advertising.
Creation of QR-code business cards and Identification cards for easy access of various events
Conversion optimization which involves using attractive strategies to change the clients' viewers into buying customers
One hour photo shoots for product and personality purposes involving make-up and dressing artists with both indoor and outdoor studio setting plus an extra hour for rehearsals.
Printing services for both commercial and corporate purposes whereby we print identification tags and business cards with QR codes.
Sale of footage shot by Mapenzi Digital for documentary and advertising purposes
UI and UX interface layout designing whereby we design a short video/animation advert of our clients websites and apps for marketing purposes
Documentary production services where we shoot a clients life for a week and provide 2 DVDs and an online version on a secured server
Customization websites where our clients can make their own designs for any category i.e. shirts, caps, business cards, banners and so much more for printing purposes.
